name: Greta the Barkeep
content: A stout, no-nonsense woman who has run The Rusty Flagon for twenty years. She keeps a clean bar and a sharp tongue. Her silver amulet — a family heirloom passed down three generations — was stolen last night while she slept. She suspects someone broke in through the storeroom. She pleads with anyone who will listen: "Please, find my amulet. It's all I have left of my mother."
